title: Ty cobb 1909 t206 red background psa vg3 for sale (PIEDMONT)
author: Rjdavis1748

posts.post_title: Ty cobb 1909 t206 red background psa vg3 for sale (PIEDMONT)
posts.post_content:
Hi everybody I am new here.  I am helping my father sell his top card he owns.  He has had it for 35-40 years and finally is willing to part with it.  It is a ty cobb t206 red background psa vg3 with the piedmont back.  Please respond with any serious offer, I will resend new pictures if anyone wants a picture with sticky note with my name and date on it.
At first I want to take offers.
